info.title: U.S. EPA Enforcement and Compliance History Online (ECHO)

contact.name: U.S. EPA, OECA Integration, Targeting and Access Branch

q.output.name: output
q.output.description:
Output Format Flag.  Enter one of the following keywords:
- JSON = Data model formatted as Javascript Object Notation (default).
- JSONP = Data model formatted as Javascript Object Notation with Padding.  
- XML = Data model formatted as Extensible Markup Language.

f.output.name: output
f.output.description:
Output Format Flag.  Enter one of the following keywords:
- JSON = Data model formatted as Javascript Object Notation (default).
- JSONP = Data model formatted as Javascript Object Notation with Padding.  
- XML = Data model formatted as Extensible Markup Language.

q.callback.name: callback
q.callback.description: JSONP Callback.  For use with JSONP and GEOJSONP output only.  Enter a name of the function in which to wrap the JSON response.

f.callback.name: callback
f.callback.description: JSONP Callback.  For use with JSONP and GEOJSONP output only.  Enter a name of the function in which to wrap the JSON response.

q.p_ct.name: p_ct
q.p_ct.description: Facility City Filter. Enter a single case-insensitive city name to filter results.

f.p_ct.name: p_ct
f.p_ct.description: Facility City Filter. Enter a single case-insensitive city name to filter results.

q.p_fips.name: p_fips
q.p_fips.description: FIPS Code Filter.  Enter a single 5-character Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) state + county value to restrict results.  E.g. to limit results to Kenosha County, Wisconsin, use 55059.

f.p_fips.name: p_fips
f.p_fips.description: FIPS Code Filter.  Enter a single 5-character Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) state + county value to restrict results.  E.g. to limit results to Kenosha County, Wisconsin, use 55059.

q.p_st.name: p_st
q.p_st.description: Facility State and State-Equivalent Filter.  Provide one or more USPS postal abbreviations for states and state-equivalents to filter results.  Provide multiple values as a comma-delimited list.

f.p_st.name: p_st
f.p_st.description: Facility State and State-Equivalent Filter.  Provide one or more USPS postal abbreviations for states and state-equivalents to filter results.  Provide multiple values as a comma-delimited list.

q.p_zip.name: p_zip
q.p_zip.description: 5-Digit ZIP Code Filter. Provide one or more 5-digit postal zip codes to filter results.  May contain multiple comma-separated values.

f.p_zip.name: p_zip
f.p_zip.description: 5-Digit ZIP Code Filter. Provide one or more 5-digit postal zip codes to filter results.  May contain multiple comma-separated values.

q.p_reg.name: p_reg
q.p_reg.description: EPA Region Filter. Provide a single value of 01 thru 10 to restrict results to a single EPA region.

f.p_reg.name: p_reg
f.p_reg.description: EPA Region Filter. Provide a single value of 01 thru 10 to restrict results to a single EPA region.

q.xmin.name: xmin
q.xmin.description: Minimum longitude value in decimal degrees.

f.xmin.name: xmin
f.xmin.description: Minimum longitude value in decimal degrees.

q.ymin.name: ymin
q.ymin.description: Minimum latitude value in decimal degrees.

f.ymin.name: ymin
f.ymin.description: Minimum latitude value in decimal degrees.

q.xmax.name: xmax
q.xmax.description: Maximum longitude value in decimal degrees.

f.xmax.name: xmax
f.xmax.description: Maximum longitude value in decimal degrees.

q.ymax.name: ymax
q.ymax.description: Maximum latitude value in decimal degrees.

f.ymax.name: ymax
f.ymax.description: Maximum latitude value in decimal degrees.

q.p_c1lat.name: p_c1lat
q.p_c1lat.description: In decimal degrees.  Latitude of 1st corner of box that bounds the resulting facilities. The latitude and longitude of both corners of the bounding box must be provided.

f.p_c1lat.name: p_c1lat
f.p_c1lat.description: In decimal degrees.  Latitude of 1st corner of box that bounds the resulting facilities. The latitude and longitude of both corners of the bounding box must be provided.

q.p_c1lon.name: p_c1lon
q.p_c1lon.description: In decimal degrees.  Longitude of 1st corner of box that bounds the resulting facilities. The latitude and longitude of both corners of the bounding box must be provided.

f.p_c1lon.name: p_c1lon
f.p_c1lon.description: In decimal degrees.  Longitude of 1st corner of box that bounds the resulting facilities. The latitude and longitude of both corners of the bounding box must be provided.

q.p_c2lat.name: p_c2lat
q.p_c2lat.description: In decimal degrees.  Latitude of 2nd corner of box that bounds the resulting facilities. The latitude and longitude of both corners of the bounding box must be provided.

f.p_c2lat.name: p_c2lat
f.p_c2lat.description: In decimal degrees.  Latitude of 2nd corner of box that bounds the resulting facilities. The latitude and longitude of both corners of the bounding box must be provided.

q.p_c2lon.name: p_c2lon
q.p_c2lon.description: In decimal degrees.  Longitude of 2nd corner of box that bounds the resulting facilities. The latitude and longitude of both corners of the bounding box must be provided.

f.p_c2lon.name: p_c2lon
f.p_c2lon.description: In decimal degrees.  Longitude of 2nd corner of box that bounds the resulting facilities. The latitude and longitude of both corners of the bounding box must be provided.

q.queryset.name: queryset
q.queryset.description: Query Limiter.  Enter a value to limit the number of records returned for each query. Value cannot exceed 70,000.

f.queryset.name: queryset
f.queryset.description: Query Limiter.  Enter a value to limit the number of records returned for each query. Value cannot exceed 70,000.

q.responseset.name: responseset
q.responseset.description: Response Set Limiter. Enter a value to limit the number of records per page. Value cannot exceed 1,000.

f.responseset.name: responseset
f.responseset.description: Response Set Limiter. Enter a value to limit the number of records per page. Value cannot exceed 1,000.

q.p_pd.name: p_pd
q.p_pd.description:
Population Density Limiter (per sq mile). Enter a value to limit results to facilities located in area of a given population density.
- NONE = 0 population density per square mile
- GT100 = More than 100 population density per square mile
- GT500 = More than 500 population density per square mile
- GT1000 = More than 1000 population density per square mile
- GT5000 = More than 5000 population density per square mile
- GT10000 = More than 10000 population density per square mile
- GT20000 = More than 20000 population density per square mile

f.p_pd.name: p_pd
f.p_pd.description:
Population Density Limiter (per sq mile). Enter a value to limit results to facilities located in area of a given population density.
- NONE = 0 population density per square mile
- GT100 = More than 100 population density per square mile
- GT500 = More than 500 population density per square mile
- GT1000 = More than 1000 population density per square mile
- GT5000 = More than 5000 population density per square mile
- GT10000 = More than 10000 population density per square mile
- GT20000 = More than 20000 population density per square mile

q.p_tribedist.name: p_tribedist
q.p_tribedist.description: Proximity to tribal land limiter. Enter an amount of mile between 0 and 25 to filter results.  This parameter is only evaluated if p_tribeid is populated.

f.p_tribedist.name: p_tribedist
f.p_tribedist.description: Proximity to tribal land limiter. Enter an amount of mile between 0 and 25 to filter results.  This parameter is only evaluated if p_tribeid is populated.

q.tablelist.name: tablelist
q.tablelist.description: Table List Flag. Enter a Y to display the first page of facility results.

f.tablelist.name: tablelist
f.tablelist.description: Table List Flag. Enter a Y to display the first page of facility results.

q.maplist.name: maplist
q.maplist.description: Map List Flag.  Provide a Y to return mappable coordinates representing the full geographic extent of the queryset (all facilities that met the selection criteria).

f.maplist.name: maplist
f.maplist.description: Map List Flag.  Provide a Y to return mappable coordinates representing the full geographic extent of the queryset (all facilities that met the selection criteria).

q.summarylist.name: summarylist
q.summarylist.description: Summary List Flag.  Enter a Y to return a list of summary statistics based on the parameters submitted to the query service.

f.summarylist.name: summarylist
f.summarylist.description: Summary List Flag.  Enter a Y to return a list of summary statistics based on the parameters submitted to the query service.

q.qid.name: qid
q.qid.description: Query ID Selector.  Enter the QueryID number from a previously run query.

f.qid.name: qid
f.qid.description: Query ID Selector.  Enter the QueryID number from a previously run query.

q.pageno.name: pageno
q.pageno.description: Indicates the number of the page to display. It is used only when the results are paginated.

f.pageno.name: pageno
f.pageno.description: Indicates the number of the page to display. It is used only when the results are paginated.

q.newsort.name: newsort
q.newsort.description: Output Sort Column.  Enter the number of the column on which the data will be sorted. If unpopulated results will sort on the first column.

f.newsort.name: newsort
f.newsort.description: Output Sort Column.  Enter the number of the column on which the data will be sorted. If unpopulated results will sort on the first column.

q.descending.name: descending
q.descending.description: Output Sort Column Descending Flag.  Enter Y to column identified in the newsort parameter descending.  Enter N to use ascending sort order. Used only when newsort parameter is populated.

f.descending.name: descending
f.descending.description: Output Sort Column Descending Flag.  Enter Y to column identified in the newsort parameter descending.  Enter N to use ascending sort order. Used only when newsort parameter is populated.

q.c1_lat.name: c1_lat
q.c1_lat.description: Latitude of 1st corner of box that bounds the resulting facilities. The latitude and longitude of both corners of the bounding box must be provided.

f.c1_lat.name: c1_lat
f.c1_lat.description: Latitude of 1st corner of box that bounds the resulting facilities. The latitude and longitude of both corners of the bounding box must be provided.

q.c1_long.name: c1_long
q.c1_long.description: Longitude of 1st corner of box that bounds the resulting facilities. The latitude and longitude of both corners of the bounding box must be provided.

f.c1_long.name: c1_long
f.c1_long.description: Longitude of 1st corner of box that bounds the resulting facilities. The latitude and longitude of both corners of the bounding box must be provided.

q.c2_lat.name: c2_lat
q.c2_lat.description: Latitude of 2nd corner of box that bounds the resulting facilities. The latitude and longitude of both corners of the bounding box must be provided.

f.c2_lat.name: c2_lat
f.c2_lat.description: Latitude of 2nd corner of box that bounds the resulting facilities. The latitude and longitude of both corners of the bounding box must be provided.

q.c2_long.name: c2_long
q.c2_long.description: Longitude of 2nd corner of box that bounds the resulting facilities. The latitude and longitude of both corners of the bounding box must be provided.

f.c2_long.name: c2_long
f.c2_long.description: Longitude of 2nd corner of box that bounds the resulting facilities. The latitude and longitude of both corners of the bounding box must be provided.

f.p_year.name: p_year
f.p_year.description: The calendar year for the annual pollutant loadings.

q.p_year.name: p_year
q.p_year.description: The calendar year for the annual pollutant loadings.

q.p_nd.name: p_nd
q.p_nd.description:
Annual Load Calculation Option. Provide a coded value to calculate annual loads using one of three methods: 
- ZERO = Set all non-detects to zero
- HALF = Set all non-detects to ½ the detection limit
- LIMIT = Set all non-detects to the detection limit

f.p_nd.name: p_nd
f.p_nd.description:
Annual Load Calculation Option. Provide a coded value to calculate annual loads using one of three methods: 
- ZERO = Set all non-detects to zero
- HALF = Set all non-detects to ½ the detection limit
- LIMIT = Set all non-detects to the detection limit

q.qcolumns.name: qcolumns
q.qcolumns.description: Used to customize service output.  A list of comma-separated column IDs of output objects that will be returned in the service query object or download.  Use the metadata service endpoint for a complete list of Ids and definitions.

f.qcolumns.name: qcolumns
f.qcolumns.description: Used to customize service output.  A list of comma-separated column IDs of output objects that will be returned in the service query object or download.  Use the metadata service endpoint for a complete list of Ids and definitions.

q.p_name.name: p_name
q.p_name.description: Case Name Filter.  Enter one or more case names to restrict results.  Provide multiple values as a comma-delimited list.  When using this parameter the p_name_type parameter is required.

f.p_name.name: p_name
f.p_name.description: Case Name Filter.  Enter one or more case names to restrict results.  Provide multiple values as a comma-delimited list.  When using this parameter the p_name_type parameter is required.

200.description: Results are an array of columns/objects.
Results are an array of columns/objects.

Year.description: The calendar year of a time dimension (reporting table) record.

RegistryID.title: FRS ID
RegistryID.description: An internal 12-digit Facility Registry Service (FRS) tracking number used to tie all facility data together in EPA regulatory program databases.

PollutantName.title: Pollutant Name
PollutantName.description: The name designating the waste material substance or chemical involved at the facility that has a Quantitative Environmental Impact addressed in the SEP or Complying Actions.

LAT.title: Latitude
LAT.description: The latitude of the facility in degrees, to four decimal places

LON.title: Longitude
LON.description: The longitude of the facility in degrees, to four decimal places

ICON.title: Icon
ICON.description: Name of each individual icon file within the URL base

TYPE.title: Type
TYPE.description: For DFR, this is always facility

NAME.title: Name
NAME.description: For DFR, this is the Facility name. The name corresponds to the TYPE value

PUV.title: Popup Value
PUV.description: Pop up value. Combine with PopUpBaseURL to give the popup for the facility

QueryID.title: Query Identifier
QueryID.description: Sequential number assigned to entire search result

IconBaseURL.title: Icon Base URL
IconBaseURL.description: URL where all the icons are located

PopUpBaseURL.title: Popup Base URL
PopUpBaseURL.description: Combine this URL with the PUC to get popup info

IconBaseURL.description: URL where all the icons are located

PopUpBaseURL.description: Combine this URL with the PUC to get popup info

IconBaseURL.description: URL where all the icons are located

PopUpBaseURL.title: Popup Base URL
PopUpBaseURL.description: Combine this URL with the PUC to get popup info

Programs.title: Programs
Programs.description: A description of the EPA program(s) under which an enforcement action has been taken, and which correspond to the cited statutes and sections.

Year1.title: Year 1
Year1.description: The calendar year during which TRI releases and transfers occurred.

Year2.title: Year 2
Year2.description: The calendar year during which TRI releases and transfers occurred.

Year3.title: Year 3
Year3.description: The calendar year during which TRI releases and transfers occurred.

Year4.title: Year 4
Year4.description: The calendar year during which TRI releases and transfers occurred.

Year5.title: Year 5
Year5.description: The calendar year during which TRI releases and transfers occurred.

Year6.title: Year 6
Year6.description: The calendar year during which TRI releases and transfers occurred.

Year7.title: Year 7
Year7.description: The calendar year during which TRI releases and transfers occurred.

Year8.title: Year 8
Year8.description: The calendar year during which TRI releases and transfers occurred.

Year9.title: Year 9
Year9.description: The most recent calendar year during which TRI releases and transfer occurred.

Year.description: The calendar year of a time dimension (reporting table) record.

ParameterCode.title: Parameter Code
ParameterCode.description: The unique 5 digit numeric code identifying the parameter. If the code is less than 5 digits in the .CSV, append zeros to the beginning of the number (e.g., 100 is equivalent to 00100)

ParameterDesc.title: Parameter Description
ParameterDesc.description: The pollutant name and form (e.g., dissolved, suspended) associated with the parameter code

EPARegion.title: EPA Region
EPARegion.description: The EPA region in which the facility is located

PopulationDensity.title: Population Density
PopulationDensity.description: The number of persons per square mile in the area being profiled. This field is the ratio of total persons (displayed in the Total Persons field) to total land area (displayed in the Land Area field)

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Field to record messages (typically performance-related) about packet processing

QueryID.description: Sequential number assigned to entire search result

PageNo.title: Page Number
PageNo.description: The number of pages of results returned
